<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phase Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1967) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1960)

</column>

---

You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target. Make a bow Strike against a foe who is [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to you (but not [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39)). The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers stop the arrow. The shot ignores all cover, the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition, the [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor. The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction using a non-magical shield.
name: Phase Arrow
